reviews.title: More good service.
reviews.text: Called at the Cheadle branch this afternoon at 2pm. Asked a member of staff for information on home/contents insurance. Was given information and a telephone appointment with the insurance partner, went online to receive an e mail from the insurer, by 3.30 I had received quote tailored to my requirements and agreed the start of cover. Plus I saved over £100 pounds on the nearest quote, highly delighted with this transaction and all the other help and advice received from Leek United regard ing our savings and investments, thank you

reviews.title: I SAVED MONEY !

reviews.title: A thoughtful old style Building Society!
reviews.text: At 70 years old, 7 years ago, The Leek gave myself and my Wife the go ahead to a 60% mortgage. It started with a 2yr fixed interest, followed by 5 year fixed. We have just been given a further 5 years, that has not increased to an unaffordable monthly payment. They are a trustworthy organisation of the old school, using invested money to lend to less well off people!

reviews.text: Leek United are professional, patient and genuinely have the interests of us clients at heart. I have always been treated as an individual. They share openly about where they spend money and it’s a pleasure knowing they’re a building society, not a bank.

reviews.title: Excellent products and service

reviews.title: Excellent customer service
reviews.text: I have been with Leek BS for the entirety of my mortgage, and have never found an alternative provider that has been able to offer me a better value product. I have always received excellent customer service, and in a world of automated phone lines, it has always been refreshing to hear a friendly human voice simply pick up the phone straight away and say, "Hello." I always feel like I'm dealing with a local high street building society which is rare these days. Thoroughly recommended.

reviews.title: Excellent Mortgage Experience
reviews.text: I had a smooth and positive experience with Leek Building Society. The application process was simple, customer support was excellent, and they offered great rates. Everything was handled efficiently and professionally. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Happy first time buyers
reviews.text: Leek Building Society were fantastic in helping me and my husband buy our first home. As first-time buyers during a period of high mortgage rates, we really appreciated how competitive their rates were and how supportive they were throughout the process. Communication has been excellent from the start, and they’ve already been in touch promptly about our upcoming renewal. We feel well looked after and are hopefully going to stay with Leek for another 2 years. Would happily recommend them.

reviews.title: Specialist mortgage organised quickly
reviews.text: Financial advisor sorted a specialist mortgage for buy to let to rent to family member. Organised quickly and efficiently. Since then communication from Leek has been excellent.

reviews.title: The Leek team were extremely easy to work with to fi...
reviews.text: The Leek team were extremely easy to work with to find my perfect mortgage solution when purchasing my first home 4 years ago. The customer service is excellent always with a friendly voice on the phone if needed.

reviews.title: Good personal customer service.

reviews.title: Happy mortage customer for ten years plus
reviews.text: Been a mortgage customer for ten plus years. Accepted us when our existing borrower would not. Always gave five star customer service and make remortgaging very easy. Always have comparable rates with other providers.

reviews.title: Best by far
reviews.text: Have had mortgages with the Leek for over thirty years. They have always been first class, both in terms of what they offer and the excellent customer service they provide. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

reviews.title: Mortgage Renewal Process
reviews.text: Mortgage renewal was a very smooth problem free process.

reviews.title: New mortgage product
reviews.text: In choosing a new mortgage product I was informed very well of the pros and cons of each as they pertained to my circumstances, making a choice much easier. The booked telephone call was on time, friendly and helpful. The calculation of affordability was very useful for reach product and the ability to pay off up to 10% of the outstanding balance each year a useful one if savings allow.

reviews.title: the right product to help in difficult times. .
reviews.text: I wanted to help my daughter and her children to secure a new home for themselves after a very distressing divorce which left her with insufficient funds to buy herself. The Leek Building Society offered exactly the right product to help me do this, a Regulated Buy to Let mortgage. The mortgage offered was competitive with a 2 year discounted rate which they have renewed for further 2 year periods at the end of the original term. On every occasion that I have contacted them they have responded in a friendly but very professional and efficient way, giving me clear information about my mortgage options, about overpaying and paying off some of the balance remaining on the mortgage. I feel that I could contact them at any time with any questions about my mortgage and receive a response from a well-informed, helpful member of staff. All this has made a huge difference to my family during a very difficult time.

reviews.title: Fixed rate came to an end.
reviews.text: Fixed rate came to an end. Was easy to find a competitive alternative product.

reviews.title: Always helpful and professional.
reviews.text: Always helpful and professional. Great mortgage product and although not independent advice, still always helpful.

reviews.title: You won't be unhappy with Leek as a mortgage provider
reviews.text: Leek Building society have been a great mortgage provider since 2020. Very clear and friendly customer service. I was delighted when my independent mortgage advisor told us Leek had come out on top for our remortgage. He told me all his clients who go with Leek say the same positive things about them.

reviews.title: Huge help at a hard time
reviews.text: Have recently come across a little hardship that will soon be resolved but needed to reach out to leek united for help regarding mortgage payments. They were so helpful and made everything simple without making me feel judged or more concerned.

reviews.title: Great mortgage rates, but not quick.
reviews.text: Leek Building Society can't be beaten on mortgage rates, we've renewed twice with them now and there was just nothing else on the market at the time that compared. The only thing I would say is that everything takes a long time, and if you want to change your product in any way you have to go through a mortgage advisor, which can be a bit of a frustrating process.

reviews.title: Always competitive deals, excellent customer service!
reviews.text: I have had a mortgage with Leek BS since 2000, year on year they have been extremely competitive, always giving me the best deals. Their customer service is second to none, always treating me as a valued customer. I wouldn’t go anywhere else!

reviews.title: Superb mortgage provider every time.
reviews.text: We've had 4 mortgage's with leek from around 1994 up to present day. They are a fresh of breath air ever time we have needed them for mortgage advice. We couldn't recommend them anougj. The staff go above & beyond ever time...even throughout the pandemic. Thankyou souch leek united for your continued help & support.

reviews.title: Very clear product details and costings.
reviews.text: Very clear product details and costings. Very easy to renew.

reviews.title: Leek has been a breath of fresh air for us!
reviews.text: Leek has been a breath of fresh air for us! They take the time to really listen to our specific situation at a human level and the advice and products they put forward are, and have always been, perfectly targeted to our needs. Their approach has never been one of a commodity sales approach, one size fits all, instead I feel like we get a tailored solution just for us. I know that they have their products to sell but it just doesn't come across that way in every interaction I've had with them over the last 10 years or so with them.

reviews.title: Always received excellent service from Leek Building...
reviews.text: Always received excellent service from Leek Building Society. They found me a mortgage which allows me to borrow against a property which I let out to my daughter and her son. They are always there if I need to chat about anything including the term of the mortgage and they are open to extending the term if necessary.

reviews.title: Good advice
reviews.text: Always had good advice and a range of products offered for my mortgage. Competitive rates and no hassle switch. Would recommend.

reviews.title: Leek Building Society the best.

reviews.title: Good mortgage provider
reviews.text: Good service, always answer the phone promptly and give the info we’re after. Never had any issues with them .

reviews.title: Excellent Service
reviews.text: My mortgage is a fixed rate for 5 years, from the start of the process Leek have been supportive, easy and excellent to deal with. I have access online to information and on the occasions where I have needed to discuss things the staff have been very easy and professional to deal with. Leek took a very commercial view when I placed my mortgage as my income was not straightforward being a mix of pensions and salary. I am grateful for their help and support at what was a stressful time having been recently widowed when I placed the mortgage.

I am lucky in able to pay additional funds off my mortgage each month. As this is no a set amount.I call each month. Every member of the customer service team have been good at taking the extra payment - logging it and immeadiately giving me a new end of month balance.

reviews.text: Had a mortgage appointment with Amy Carvill which went great! She was really helpful and informative, explained everything in great detail and made sure I was comfortable with everything while also being really personable.

reviews.title: Happy with the Leek Building Society
reviews.text: I was supported at a difficult time to transition between mortgage products and felt wholly supported and not just another customer of a large organisation. This meant a lot at a time of stress and anxiety.

reviews.title: Useful 2 year review
reviews.text: As the 2 year term is approaching its end, I got a thorough run through of the options available. Agent always took into account my preferences as to balance of cost and flexibility.

reviews.title: A massive thank you to Laura Bradshaw
reviews.text: A massive thank you to Laura Bradshaw for all her help in a stressful situation!

reviews.title: Good helpful friendly advise
reviews.text: Good helpful friendly advise , I spoke to an advisor on phone , who then guided me to apply for a re mortgage online , this was very easy to do , it took less than 5 minutes.

reviews.title: Best mortgage provider for us and good savings rates...
reviews.text: Best mortgage provider for us and good savings rates too. Staff are always friendly and helpful whether contacted by telephone or in person.

reviews.title: The best staff team
reviews.text: At every stage my experience of Leek Building Society and their staff has been fabulous. The phones are answered quickly, and you get the sense that the person on the end of the phone is smiling. It is so different from almost every other customer experience anywhere these days.

reviews.title: The times that we needed to speak to customer servic...
reviews.text: The times that we needed to speak to customer service was excellent

reviews.title: Amy was amazing answered all my questions and walked...
reviews.text: Amy was amazing answered all my questions and walked me through everything I didn't quite understand and listened to everything we wanted and found the perfect plan for us

reviews.title: Professional and efficient.
reviews.text: Professional and efficient. Good communication.

reviews.title: I recently placed my first mortgage with yourselves...
reviews.text: I recently placed my first mortgage with yourselves and it was a smooth process from start to finish. The underwriter on the case (Emarald) was fantastic and despite the quirky circumstances of the client, Leek were able to get an offer produced. Would defiantly use Leek again

reviews.title: Leek came to my rescue
reviews.text: I was going through the process of buying my house when my previous lender (Leeds Building Society) decided not to go ahead with the mortgage but Leek came to my rescue. Thank you.

reviews.title: Remortgage 2nd time
reviews.text: I've remortgage with them for second time. They been preety good and realist with the interes

reviews.title: Kind, supportive and professional
reviews.text: The staff at the Newcastle-under Lyme branch were extremely helpful and supportive when I was made redundant. They guided me through insurance etc. This was in 2010. I continued with them before being able to pay my mortgage off. I currently have a Savings account with Leek United. I will remain with this Society because I will never forget the kindness shown to me when I needed help. Thank you.

reviews.title: Leek have been a breath of fresh air for us.
reviews.text: Leek have been a breath of fresh air for us. Always available and great communication regarding any changes. Straight forward, upfront, great company!

reviews.title: Very easy to deal with, they make the whole process...
reviews.text: Very easy to deal with, they make the whole process a good experience.

reviews.title: Leek building society mortgages
reviews.text: We started our mortgage with leek building society almost 3 years ago, they we so easy to work with and very helpful as we were first time buyers. I would recommend them to anyone getting a mortgage.

reviews.title: Good mortgage product and a very good remortgage in...
reviews.text: Good mortgage product and a very good remortgage interest rate.

reviews.title: Personal and friendly service
reviews.text: Personal and friendly service, always felt informed and kept up to date. Leek give a dedicated person to contact and feel like a valued customer rather than like I am dealing with a faceless corporation.

reviews.title: Our remortgage was easily and painlessly dealt with
reviews.text: Our remortgage was easily and painlessly dealt with

reviews.title: A true Customer Care Mortgage Provider!
reviews.text: Because of their customer care, we enjoyed the first 3 yrs of the same interest rate and we are currently enjoying a 5yr fixed term contract. Helps our budgeting no end.

reviews.title: The Leek is probably the best lender out there
reviews.text: Communications are excellent although the Leek is at times a little bit too thorough which does make applications slow.

reviews.title: Always helpful and efficient.
reviews.text: I've always found them helpful and efficient. They ate always polite and get back to you promptly. Great service.

reviews.title: Can't rate the Leek highly enough!
reviews.text: Can't rate the Leek highly enough! I have remortgaged several times with Leek Building Society over the past 15 years and have never been disappointed. Their products have been good and suited my needs well, but it is the personal service that really stands out and is the reason I have rated them so highly.

reviews.title: Mortgage Advice
reviews.text: I recently had mortgage advice with Laura, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the experience. Laura was incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and attentive to all my questions and concerns. She provided clear and comprehensive guidance.

reviews.title: We have recently changed our mortgage product and th...
reviews.text: We have recently changed our mortgage product and the process was seamless. Staff communication was extremely efficient.

reviews.title: I am the first time house buyer I got loan approved...
reviews.text: I am the first time house buyer I got loan approved by leek before agreed date. Even there process is predefined they not push people for unnecessary document reviews.

reviews.title: Local lender who understands the people they are len...
reviews.text: Local lender who understands the people they are lending to, gave us a great start when they provided us with a mortgage on our small holding when other lender wouldn't realise the value of the whole property.

reviews.title: Great advise & helpful staff.
reviews.text: Great advise & helpful staff. I would recommend Leek Building Society to everyone.

reviews.title: Always helpful and useful information provided durin...
reviews.text: Always helpful and useful information provided during mortgage discussions

reviews.title: I have never had a mortgage with any other lender, a...
reviews.text: I have never had a mortgage with any other lender, and that speaks for itself! Friendly supportive staff and will do anything to help. Just the best.

reviews.title: 10 out of 10 service!
reviews.text: 10 out of 10 service! Always do what they say they are going to, quick at responding to emails and will go above and beyond to help! Thank you Craig and the rest of the mortgage team youve amazing! An absolute credit to Leek for sure!!

reviews.title: I found it very smooth, seamless and uncomplicated.
reviews.text: I found it very smooth, seamless and uncomplicated.

reviews.title: Mortgage advice
reviews.text: Amy who advised me was excellent, can’t recommend her and the Society enough. Brilliant service though out.

reviews.title: a painless experience., A mortgage made easy.
reviews.text: Having had some bad experiences with other Building Societies I was apprehensive about my meeting with yourselves, this was not necessary as Amy explained everything in layman terms for me and made the whole process painless, a massive thank you to Amy 10 out of 10

reviews.title: Efficient mortgage service
reviews.text: Excellent mortgage service when my product was coming to an end. The whole process was very efficient

reviews.title: Nice flexible mortgage
reviews.text: I have held a mortgage with Leek Building Society for almost 14 years now. Flexible repayment arrangements and competitive interest rates means that I haven't needed to change providers.

reviews.title: Always exceptional service from the Leek
reviews.text: Always receive exceptional service from Leek Building Society. Staff are professional and knowledgeable. Products offered for my product switch were very competitive and the process to switch was very easy and straightforward.

reviews.title: Extremely helpful and caring mortgage lenders.
reviews.text: Extremely helpful mortgage people who helped us buy a bungalow for my disabled son who passed away in October but gratefully enjoyed 4years independence in his new home where he was very happy and settled ,so thank you so very much .Also wonder local counter staff.

reviews.title: Mortgage Renewal
reviews.text: When I was due to renew my mortgafe the staff were extremely knowledgeable and helpful and it made you feel like a real person and not just a number. They discussed all the options and out omes in detail to enable me to make an informed decision on my mortgage product.

reviews.title: First mortgage for a new build.
reviews.text: First mortgage for a new build. Great communication and a competitive product in a tight market.

reviews.title: Friendly easy and Straight forward
reviews.text: Friendly easy and Straight forward

reviews.title: Love the ease of speaking to a real person and the r...
reviews.text: Love the ease of speaking to a real person and the right person to help me.

reviews.title: Approachable, helpful, informative and friendly.
reviews.text: I needed to remortgage from Domestic to Buy To Let and the process from beginning to end was pain-free, easy to understand and taken at a pace which did not leave me behind or drown me with jargon. Joanne Morgan from the Leek team was professional whilst being friendly and supportive during the process. I would highly recommend the Leek for being approachable, helpful, informative and friendly.

reviews.title: We love Leek Building Society
reviews.text: Why do we love Leek Building Society? Love is about growing together through good communication and assistance. Love is responding to changing needs by listening. Love is feeling secure and happy about choices.. Love is financial peace of mind. That's why we love Leek Building Society.

reviews.title: I received mortgage advice from Joanne she was so he...
reviews.text: I received mortgage advice from Joanne she was so helpful and i would definitely recommend Leek to other people

reviews.title: Just from the start, everyone was so helpful and dur...
reviews.text: Just from the start, everyone was so helpful and during the process of the mortgage plan just took us through step by step to make it as simple and as smooth as possible.

reviews.title: Always been with Leek Utd.
reviews.text: Always been with Leek Utd. Brilliant personal service. Cannot fault them. Have been genuinely competitive throughout our mortgage

reviews.title: I have been with the Leek for 9 years and they have...
reviews.text: I have been with the Leek for 9 years and they have always been the best choice in the marketplace. Not only on price but for customer service and going the extra mile . They make sure I’m fully onboard with everything before proceeding

reviews.title: Mortgage for Derek & Mary Taylor
reviews.text: whenever I phone I always get a return call quickly. Responses good & reliable. Our mortgage was issued last minute through no fault or yours. When the delayed info arrived you issued the offer & the funds in exemplary time literally a couple of days for completion . A wonderful experience

reviews.title: Extremely helpful and knowledgeable staff.
reviews.text: Extremely helpful and knowledgeable staff. A great help setting up my mortgage during the COVID period

reviews.title: Easy to talk to some one human on the other side of...
reviews.text: Easy to talk to some one human on the other side of the phone. Excellent customer service.

reviews.title: From the application stage through the survey and on...
reviews.text: From the application stage through the survey and onto offer they were the best we have dealt with and when a query arises etc they deal with on the phone there and then

reviews.title: I recently have taken a mortgage with Leek.
reviews.text: I recently have taken a mortgage with Leek. The process was so smooth and efficient. Customer service so far has been impeccable. Would certainly recommend given my initial sceptieisim of a less unknown brand name

reviews.title: Customer service is very accessible, quick responses...
reviews.text: Customer service is very accessible, quick responses and its great to be able to speak to a person. Online is pretty basic but gives information required. Changes to interest rate drops are very slow but this might be across the board. Selected due to good rates and would do again.

reviews.title: I have been either leek for 10 years now.
reviews.text: I have been either leek for 10 years now. I don’t need to talk to them often but when I do they’re there responding promptly with good advice from competent employees.

reviews.title: Good experience , negative side , no app .
reviews.text: Good experience , negative side , no app .

reviews.title: Wanted a buy to let mortgage..
reviews.text: Wanted a buy to let mortgage and the rates with the leek united were very competitive and the actions of the staff was fantastic

reviews.title: Just the right level of service.
reviews.text: I took out my Tracker mortgage with Leek United in 2007 and it proved to be the right decision, both financially and from a service perspective. The choice of a Tracker mortgage, worked in my favour in the earlier years, but also made me effectively overpay when the interest rates dropped. Service-wise Leek United have it just right, with minimal but appropriate communication, avoiding any unwanted 'Sales' type mailshots or electronic materials.

reviews.title: First time buyers
reviews.text: Myself and my husband were recently first time buyers so everything felt very overwhleming however we absolutley didnt need to feel like this as Leek building society were approachable and easy to use. All documents were dealt with fast and any questions were answered promptly, we had no issues at all. Leek building society made a very scary and stressful time much easier!

reviews.title: Overall I have been with leek united since 2007 and...
reviews.text: Overall I have been with leek united since 2007 and have always found them excellent.

reviews.title: Leek have been brilliant since day 1
reviews.text: Leek have been brilliant since day 1

reviews.title: 5 Star Service.
reviews.text: Staff are very friendly, helpful and knowledgeable.

reviews.title: Manual underwriting
reviews.text: I was looking for a mortgage provider who offered manual underwriting as I prefer the more human approach. It was a great experience all around and I couldnt recommend highly enough! All of the advisors were super helpful and always clear and concise. Thank you so much!

reviews.title: 'Simply the Best!'
reviews.text: The Leek Building Society is our fourth building society and by far the best in 30 years of being homeowners. There is always 'a human' to speak to on the other end of the line and the advice is cobstructive, practical and, at times, reassuring. We would not now go to any other provider!

reviews.title: Mortgage advisor was very knowledgeable and professi...
reviews.text: Mortgage advisor was very knowledgeable and professional and could not do enough for us

reviews.title: Outstanding Service
reviews.text: Professional, efficient, polite are just some of the words to describe Leek Building Society's customer service. Always on hand if you have an issue and always understanding during tough times. Quick responses and clear and precise information make their customer service second to none.

reviews.title: Have been with Leek for over 10 years.
reviews.text: Have been with Leek for over 10 years. Always approachable and helpful. With great customer service, you are a true customer not just a number!

reviews.title: I have been with Leek Building Society for 11 years...
reviews.text: I have been with Leek Building Society for 11 years and I wouldn't dream of changing as their services is excellent. They are always knowledgeable about the product and always make sure it suitable to my needs. What i love most is that I can call them and speak to someone instead of an online service. They are highly recommended in my view

reviews.title: Years of good service
reviews.text: Have stayed with Leek BS for more than 10 years of home ownership, always receive a good level of service from a friendly team. Very much appreciate still having a local branch.

reviews.title: Very helpful staff
reviews.text: Very helpful staff easy to contact on the phone

reviews.title: Recommended to my friend
reviews.text: Leek building society have provided me with a solution to my situation. They are always helpful and answer any questions I may have. They take time to ensure that I am getting the correct product for my meds. I have already recommended Leek building society to a friend.

reviews.title: They are a great lender.
reviews.text: They are a great lender. Real people!

reviews.title: They have always been really helpful.
reviews.text: They have always been really helpful. Especially when covid hit and there were alot of struggles around mortgage payments. Nothing was ever too much hassle. Very supportive

reviews.title: Generally good.
reviews.text: I’ve never had any problems contacting them and always received good service and information. Their website works well and keeps me up to date with new offers. The only disappointment was the charges made foe renewing my mortgage with them. I felt they were excessive considering I was a loyal customer.

reviews.title: Excellent service and products
reviews.text: Easy to contact. Great to deal with. Quick appointments. Competitive products that I find hard to beat. Freindly and knowledgable staff who seem to go out of their way to help you and treat you as a person not just a customer. Been with Leek for years and highly recommend.

reviews.title: The people's champions
reviews.text: I have personally always had a great experience with Leek and they have always looked after me, whether that be keeping me up to date (but not flooded me with letters, adverts and the likes) They have always been lovely on the phone, a proper person, family run business vibe and speaking to me in normal terms without confusing jargon. I have a mortgage, loan and considering a child ISA with Leek too because the service is amazing and rates very attractive

reviews.title: Great personal service and very fair.
reviews.text: Leek Buiding Society interest rates are fair, and they provide excellent personal service. They work hard to ensure that you are on the correct product for your needs.

reviews.title: Good response time when answering phone
reviews.text: Good response time when answering phone, always have information at hand

reviews.title: Excellent support and feedback from LBS
reviews.text: Excellent support and feedback from LBS regards the management of my Property portfolio and the supporting Mortgages

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text: Great value for money with great rates and excellent friendly customer services

reviews.title: Seamless service so far.
reviews.text: Seamless service so far. Switched from an old mortgage to a new one on a new property. Process went smoothly and quickly.

reviews.title: Been with Leek for over 10 years.
reviews.text: Been with Leek for over 10 years. Stayed with them when I bought my new house helpful and no problems.

reviews.title: Reel good
reviews.text: Reel good to work with exalt consumer service

reviews.title: Excellent Building Society
reviews.text: Efficient service with friendly knowledgeable staff. A million times better than our previous mortgage lender.

reviews.title: Highly recommended for Mortgages
reviews.text: Always helpful and clear with any information. Always quick to respond to any requests. Very good company to deal with.

reviews.title: Quick, efficient, helpful service.
reviews.text: Excellent service when I applied for a buy to let, interest only mortgage at the age of 62. Leek were helpful and efficient and I was able to secure a 5 year fixed term mortgage at a very favourable rate.

reviews.title: Fabulous products/services as a specialist lender
reviews.text: Fabulous products and services for people who may have limited options on mortgage products available to them. As first time buyers, purchasing a new build apartment they were able to understand our circumstances and offer the most relevant product - of which are not as readily available from high street lenders. They were able to keep up to the speed of processing as high street lenders too and kept our broker informed throughout.

reviews.title: Best Morgages Providers out there.
reviews.text: We have had our mortgages with leek until from our initial house purchase right through to our lash house purchase. Always the best deals provided Staff very friendly & offer great advise. Don't hesitate to use them for your mortgage. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: The phone consultations are detailed and helpful.
reviews.text: The phone consultations are detailed and helpful. Talking about the choices leads to a clearer decision

reviews.title: Great mortgage advice
reviews.text: Been with leek for 8 years they have always given great advice & great value for money

reviews.title: Short term later life mortgage.
reviews.text: Short term later life mortgage. On going advice excellent, very helpful.

reviews.title: Setting up my Mortgage.
reviews.text: Nice and easy to set up my Mortgage
